content:
Check:
  all:
    - name: variable_label
      operator: longer_than
      value: 40
Core:
  Id: CORE-000019
  Version: '1'
  Status: Published
Description: Raise and error if Variable label length > 40 characters
Outcome:
  Message: Variable label length should be less than or equal to 40 characters
Rule Type: Variable Metadata Check
Sensitivity: Dataset
Authorities:
  - Organization: CDISC
    Standards:
      - Name: SDTMIG
        Version: '3.4'
        References:
          - Origin: SDTM and SDTMIG Conformance Rules
            Rule Identifier:
              Id: CG0311
              Version: '1'
            Version: '2.0'
            Citations:
              - Cited Guidance: Variable descriptive names (labels), up to 40 characters,
                  should be provided as data variable labels for all variables, including
                  Supplemental Qualifier variables.
                Document: IG v3.4
                Section: 4.2.1
Scope:
  Classes:
    Include:
      - ALL
  Domains:
    Include:
      - ALL
